column1: Smoque BBQ////So we ordered a buffet from here for my parent's anniversary... We had both ribs
column3: brisket and texas sausage.  We also had all the sides and cornbread. Everything was delicious as always.. brisket was extra yummy..  I did notice that the beans were a tad more watery/vinegary then usual and so was the coleslaw. They were both still very good but I think since they packed them in large tubs they lost some of there charm...
